I have an idling VPS with Unique Geek that I'm cutting loose.

Specs:
1GB of RAM/1.5GB burstable
2 IPv4
80GB HDD
2TB BW
Location: Buffalo
Expires: 4/29/2014
Recurring price: $19/year

It had ~200 days of uptime until a moment ago, when I just did a reinstall.

How this works:
The VPS is free if only one person is interested.  The second person bids $1 or more, with each subsequent person incrementing by $1.  This is to ensure that the VPS is taken seriously, and not just claimed because it's free and left idle.

That's all, folks!
